svg.title: MPLP Four-Layer Architecture (L1-L4)
svg.desc: MPLP Protocol Architecture diagram showing four layers: L1 Core Protocol (Schemas, Envelopes, Invariants), L2 Coordination and Governance Modules (10 Modules), L3 Runtime Glue (AEL, VSL, PSG), and L4 Integration Layer (Tools, IDEs, Frameworks, Platforms).

rdf:Description.dc:title: MPLP Four-Layer Architecture Diagram
rdf:Description.dc:description: Visual representation of the MPLP Protocol's L1-L4 architecture stack for AI agent lifecycle management.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Bangshi Beijing Network Technology Limited Company
rdf:Description.dc:rights: Copyright 2025 Bangshi Beijing Network Technology Limited Company. Apache-2.0 License.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: MPLP Architecture, L1 Core Protocol, L2 Modules, L3 Runtime Glue, L4 Integration, AEL, VSL, PSG

svg.text: L4 • Integration Layer — Tools · IDEs · Frameworks · Platforms
L3 • Runtime Glue — AEL · VSL · PSG
L1 • Core Protocol — Schemas · Envelopes · Invariants
